features: New SheaMoisture Baby Body Cream helps you bond with your baby and create a relaxing nighttime hair and skin care regimen
This moisturizer is infused with a blend of plant-based oils, Manuka Honey and a soothing lavender scent to nourish your baby's skin, making it even softer to the touch
This moisturizing body cream is part of the SheaMoisture Baby hair care range, created to serve babies with melanin-rich skin and textured hair
Apply lotion on baby's skin after bath or anytime baby needs a kiss of moisture; This body cream is excellent for a calming and relaxing massage
All SheaMoisture skin care products are sustainably produced and Cruelty-Free; This body cream for babies is pediatrician-tested and hypoallergenic
body.description: New SheaMoisture Baby Manuka Honey & Lavender Body Cream helps you bond with your baby and create a relaxing nighttime skin care regimen. Nurture and protect your baby's delicate skin with this moisturizing Body Cream. Blended with plant-based oils, Manuka Honey and a soothing lavender scent, this body cream formula nourishes your baby's skin, making it even softer to the touch. It's the perfect addition to your relaxing nighttime routine. Apply SheaMoisture Baby Manuka Honey & Lavender Body Cream on baby's skin after bath or anytime baby needs a kiss of moisture. This moisturizer is for a calming and relaxing massage. SheaMoisture Baby Manuka Honey & Lavender Body Cream is formulated with no parabens, no phthalates, no mineral oil, no petrolatum and no animal testing. All SheaMoisture hair and skin products are sustainably produced and Cruelty-Free. Our Story: SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker, a pioneering mother of four and entrepreneur, who sold Shea Butter, African Black Soap and homemade beauty preparations in Sierra Leone in 1912. We honor her vision by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa. With every purchase, you show support of our mission to reinvest back in our communities.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Nurture and protect your baby's delicate skin with SheaMoisture Baby Manuka Honey and Lavender Moisturizing Body Cream. Blended with plant-based oils, Manuka Honey and a calming Lavender scent, this formula nourishes your baby's skin, making it even softer to touch. The perfect addition to your relaxing nighttime routine.

Pediatrician-Tested This moisturizing body cream is pediatrician-tested with a gentle formula Calming Scent This moisturizing body cream is infused with a soothing lavender scent for a relaxing experience. Hypoallergenic Formula Specially formulated with Manuka Honey and plant-based oils, this tear-free formula is pediatrician-tested. Our Promise Formulated with no sulfates, parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, petrolatum and, no animal testing.

SheaMoisture Baby Manuka Honey & Lavender Shampoo & Bath Milk, 13 oz SheaMoisture Baby Manuka Honey & Lavender Hair & Body Oil, 4.1 oz SheaMoisture Baby Manuka Honey & Lavender Pre-Wash Detangler, 8 oz Main Benefit SheaMoisture Baby Manuka Honey & Lavender Shampoo & Bath Milk cleanses baby's hair and skin and creates a relaxing bedtime soak. Naturally nourishing, this lightweight hair and body oil leaves your baby's skin and hair feeling soft from head to toe. SheaMoisture Baby Manuka Honey & Lavender Pre-Wash Detangler makes bathtime a calming experience for both mom and baby with this Pre-Wash Detangler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells great and really helps relax my baby after bath time. It doesn’t leave any residue behind and is smooth on the skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the smell
reviews.reviewText: Smells great! It's also super moisturizing for your baby after a bedtime bath

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cream has a lovely and not so strong smell of lavender. My little ones smell great after night time shower. It’s my night time routine staple.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle on baby
reviews.reviewText: This lotion smells amazing, hydrates my baby’s sensitive skin and she loves the feeling of it after her baths!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This lotion is very creamy and absorbs well. It smells of vanilla and lavender. I use this myself, and I'm an adult. Love all Shea Moisture products. I will buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We loved the prior version of this and we were devastated when they stopped making it. Like I bought all I could find!This is very similar but I feel like the scent is not as strong in a good way. It’s way less “overpowering”.The lotion is light weight non greasyHighly recommend. I use this lotion as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft and smells nice
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a super soft shea butter lotion and stumbled across this. The smell is nice and refreshing, not too overpowering. Feels nice on the skin however is not as thick as expected. There are some better shae butters on the market. But for the price, I will take it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the smell of it. It works great on my grand baby .
